title: List of unsolved problems of reverse engineering
content:
Decided to write out a list of still unsolved fundamental problems in the field of reverse engineering.

This means that today - there is no easy solution to these problems, or problems that can only be solved manually with a lot of effort and time.

All these problems are mainly related to the lack of debugging information in pe-executables, therefore, I did not separate them into separate topics-questions.

Let me know if there is already a solution for at least one of these problems.
